# `<dso-banner>`

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property              | Attribute | Description                 | Type                                         | Default     |
| --------------------- | --------- | --------------------------- | -------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `compact`             | `compact` | Compact mode.               | `boolean`                                    | `false`     |
| `noIcon`              | `no-icon` | Option to hide banner icon. | `boolean`                                    | `true`      |
| `status` _(required)_ | `status`  | The status of the banner.   | `"danger" \| "error" \| "info" \| "warning"` | `undefined` |
